channel.title: Competencies on Learning Through Collaboration
channel.description: Recent content in Competencies on Learning Through Collaboration

item.title: Let's combine our ideas
item.description: Team members shared their machine designs and explored possible solutions. They questioned each other and took time to listen attentively to weigh options and feedback each other.In the end this team decided to retain the strong points of each design and COMBINE them into one big idea.
